item.title: The story behind docker image "alpinegovim"
item.description: Motivation Many of you might think that wanting to develop remotely in docker container is bazaar. Here is why alpinegovim was created. alpinegovim is all-in-one development environment which can run in a docker container in the cloud with access to terminal as a web application. Beginning One day I was working for a company in NY as a consultant. Consulting agreement was signed in advance. Project manager had put in a request for the laptop I said I would need.
